entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is excitedly pointing towards the opposite side of the paddock.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is jogging into the paddock behind the creatures and holding their chains.

entities.name: hippogriffs
entities.description: The creatures are described as having the bodies, hind legs, and tails of horses, but the front legs, wings, and heads of what seemed to be giant eagles.

relationships.description: Hagrid is holding the chains of the creatures and urging them towards the fence.
Lavender Brown is excitedly pointing towards the opposite side of the paddock where the creatures are standing.
